TopicTitle: Universal Space Plane. From Kerbin to Minmus, Mun and back to Kerbin

Articles.Content:
Hello. Today i want to show you my newest creation. This Space Plane capable to reach orbit 150x150 (with help of lifting stage and has a lot fuel left to burn). Todays mission is to reach Kerbin orbit, then go to Minmus and land. Next step is to go to Mun, land and go back to orbit. The last move is to come back home and land on the runway. Tell me guys what you think abaut this .craft and enjoy.

Sorry for mistakes in text but english is not my native language.

http://www14.zippyshare.com/v/14723380/file.html Link to .craft
